comments:
Using Eclipse v3.0 M7.

If I use the new Eclipse look and feel, start a new workspace and go to Window >
Preferences > Workbench > Editors and click OK I get a NullPointerException.
(This only happens using the new look and feel and when I view the 'Editors'
preference page)

java.lang.NullPointerException
	at
org.eclipse.ui.internal.dialogs.EditorsPreferencePage.performOk(EditorsPreferencePage.java:139)
	at
org.eclipse.ui.internal.ide.dialogs.IDEEditorsPreferencePage.performOk(IDEEditorsPreferencePage.java:206)
	at
org.eclipse.jface.preference.PreferenceDialog.okPressed(PreferenceDialog.java:779)
	at
org.eclipse.jface.preference.PreferenceDialog.buttonPressed(PreferenceDialog.java:223)

Created an attachment (id=7911)
Eclipse log file showing full exception trace

my mistake, I had forgotten to replace org.eclipse.ui.ide_3.0.0\ide.jar with
org.eclipse.ui.ide_3.0.0\ide-new.jar.  After correcting this error, I am unable
to reproduce the reported problem.  This can be closed.
*** Bug 52387 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
